tool_description:
Set your webhook url via the Keepalive endpoint, and you will receive a webhook on that url each time your Otter.ai account transcribes a conversation.  
The webhook payload contains the full conversation transcription. 
All data is securely encrypted.
name: BC Real Time Otter.ai
title: BC Real Time Otter.ai

api_list.name: bcOtteraiApi
api_list.description: Calls internal Otter.ai Api, returns its raw result.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bc-real-time-otter-ai.p.rapidapi.com/bcOtteraiApi"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bc-real-time-otter-ai.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Keepalive
api_list.description: This endpoint must be called once every 7 days, so that the webhook service continues to operate.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bc-real-time-otter-ai.p.rapidapi.com/otterKeepAlive"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bc-real-time-otter-ai.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: (Internal) Push webhook
api_list.description:
This is an "internal webhook".
It should not be directly called.
It exists only for internal purposes, to push the right webhook at the right moment.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bc-real-time-otter-ai.p.rapidapi.com/bcForwardWebhookToClient"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bc-real-time-otter-ai.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
